description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Battle to success across the land of Gondwanaland against the demonic aliens; who have an evil desire to take over your land. With your cavemen and pterodactyls crush the aliens hopes and prevent your race from extinction in this easy to pick up and play real-time-strategy game.  Fight today! Live tomorrow!
